articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: CSA boss Nkwe says T20 World Cup review took place, informed 2023 changes: We played too much cricket
articles.description: Cricket South Africa's director of cricket, Enoch Nkwe, said they did undertake a review of last year's failed T20 World Cup, and it played a huge role in how they improved in the recently concluded Cricket World Cup.
articles.content: Cricket South Africa's director of cricket Enoch Nkwe said they did not one, but two reviews last season to look after the national team and the domestic system last season, with the former one ident… [+458 chars]

articles.title: Adriaan Basson | It's just not cricket: More reasonability and less shouting, please
articles.description: In the noise of all the shouting about the young cricketer David Teeger's ill-advised statements about Israel, the reasonable middle is drowned out, writes Adriaan Basson.
articles.content:

articles.title: Brook and Sciver-Brunt claim top Cricket Writers' Club awards
articles.description: England batter Harry Brook claims the top prize at the 2023 Cricket Writers' Club awards.
articles.content:
This year England batter Harry Brook became the fastest to player to reach 1,000 career Test runs, in terms of balls faced
